attributes.action: To ban all cars imports which bulbs that are required by UK law cant be changed by the public at the roadside
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Its becoming more frustating now with new cars the simple tasks are impossible to do like changing bulbs which are require by law to have lit when dark and foggy and raining , there quick enough to fine us because one is out but dont force car makers to ensure these jobs can be done there and then by the public at the road side

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
